ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mvrladdi.1 | |- B e. CC |
| 2 |  | mvrladdi.2 | |- C e. CC |
| 3 |  | mvrladdi.3 | |- A = ( B + C ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_comraddi | |- A = ( C + B ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( A - B ) = ( ( C + B ) - B ) |
| 6 | 2, 1 | #P_pncan3oi | |- ( ( C + B ) - B ) = C |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_eqtri | |- ( A - B ) = C |
